short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for automatically skipping video ads and closing banner ads on YouTube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is basically formed by a simple script that uses an observer to detect and skip/close any new ad (video or banner) on a YouTube video.
